about_the_game:
Dive into the neon-lit world of Pulse Rebound, a one-of-a-kind adventure platformer set in a sprawling sci-fi city. When a routine system update goes wrong, an army of haywire robots takes control, plunging the city into chaos. It's up to you, a daring adventurer with a powerful trampoline, to restore order and unlock the secrets lurking within. Leap to unimaginable heights, mastering the art of trampoline-based exploration.

Reach areas that seem out of reach, overcome complex puzzles, and traverse vertical environments in search of hidden paths and valuable collectibles. Your trampoline isn’t just a tool for travel—use it to deflect projectiles, outmaneuver enemies, and turn the tide in fast-paced combat encounters against rogue robots.

Every hidden trophy you find will enhance your home base, transforming your apartment into a personalized trophy room that reflects your achievements. With each collectible earned, you’ll gain new rewards and abilities to help you tackle even greater challenges.

Innovative Trampoline Mechanics: Experience a fresh take on platforming as you use your trampoline to bounce through levels, perform gravity-defying stunts, and reach places conventional methods can’t.

Intense Combat: Face off against a horde of malfunctioning robots. Use your trampoline to dodge, deflect, and take down enemies in dynamic, acrobatic battles. Exploration-Focused

Gameplay: Discover the hidden depths of a vibrant sci-fi city. Unveil secrets, solve intricate puzzles, and unlock shortcuts to become a master of the environment.

Customize Your Apartment: Collect hidden trophies scattered throughout the city to furnish and upgrade your apartment, showing off your prowess and accomplishments.

A World of Mystery: Why did the robots go haywire? Who is behind the city’s malfunction? Uncover the truth as you progress through a story filled with intrigue and unexpected twists. Prepare for a high-flying adventure! Bounce through the chaos, reclaim the city, and leave your mark on this sci-fi metropolis. Pulse Rebound—the sky is no longer the limit!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 11 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8565U
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 1030
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
